long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the FinlyBoost browser extension: your gateway to earning cashback while you shop at your favorite stores or apply for new financial products.

Here's how the FinlyBoost extension simplifies earning cashback:

1. Install the FinlyBoost extension on your browser
2. Browse partner websites and shop from your favorite brands
3. When you get prompted to activate cash back, click on the activate button and continue shopping as you normally would
4. Watch your cash back come in within days of your completed transaction

One-Click Cashback Activation:
We share a portion of the commission we receive from our partners with you as cashback. A simple click on the FinlyBoost extension also icon reveals the various cash back opportunities available to you.

Automatic Cashback, No Follow-Up Needed:
Forget the hassle of claiming your cashback. We automatically credit it to your FinlyWealth account within 3-4 weeks of your purchase, making the process smooth and straightforward.

With FinlyBoost, it's as simple as Shop, Earn, and Enjoy.
